
function encrypt(m, e, n: integer): integer;
begin
	
	
	return (m**e mod n);
end;

function decrypt(c, d, n: integer): integer;
begin
	
	return (c**d mod n);
end;

function findN(f: integer): integer;
var
	e: integer;
begin
	e:=2;
	while(gcd(e,f) <> 1) do
		e:=e+1;
	end;
	
	return e;
end;


function privateKey(f,e: integer):integer;
var
	r0, r1, rZwischenspeicher, x0, x1, xZwischenspeicher, q: integer;
begin
	
	r0 := f;
	r1 := e;
	x0 := 0;
	x1 := 1;
	
	
	while (r1 <> 1) do
	
		q := r0 div r1;
	
		rZwischenspeicher := r1;
		r1 := r0 mod r1;
		r0 := rZwischenspeicher;
		
		
		xZwischenspeicher := x1;
		x1 := x0 - x1*q;
		x0 := xZwischenspeicher;
		
	end;
	

	
	return x1 mod f;	
end;




p: 2701533919761561761620433960658467555336581234051464961554719690708683236063854586640885293381722911

q: 7015397214152891900340352675053025046504193365007295519140353105773693673235846232057662394432991719

n: 18952333534634802581587191554113225989760480809571743922118132259957374533983927460938401408109704558955484454042871828660912921231584032111978535745255683494056853611501044758875209756080460415574009

f: 18952333534634802581587191554113225989760480809571743922118132259957374533983927460938401408109704549238553320128418166700126285520091430271203936686495202798984057129124135459174391057532772600859380

e: 11

d: 15506454710155747566753156726092639446167666116922335936278471849056033709623213377131419333907940085740634534650523954572830597243711170221894130016223347744623319469283383557506319956163177582521311


###################### Text an Herrn Hoever ############################################

In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit.

######################### Text von Herr Hoever ######################################

c:= 5137184115833924860936621598633715181185203860475107364328640278154793786957765216100180176601787878436307564043964569490671235200444299422445479940899409096196775139098437540830227855157048363003439

m:= 418400876583006500727966667384137279766912006578680084726584007769657883006779777079828414

It was a hobbit-hole, and that means comfort.




##################### Mein Test ######################################################

m:= 417800650072797669007378008472690071827985786800847269826900767386696800650072796666738414

In a hole in the ground there lived a hobbit.

klappt ne
